PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-10322021-12-17,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  CIRNAC
ActIndian Act
SubjectAnnapolis Valley First Nation Specific Claim Settlement Agreement
PrecisOrder (1) authorizing the Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations to ENTER INTO AND EXECUTE, on behalf of Her Majesty the Queen in right of Canada, the ANNAPOLIS VALLEY FIRST NATION Alienation of 137 Acres of St. Croix Reserve #34 Specific Claim Settlement Agreement, a summary of which is set out in Schedule A to the Order; and, (2) accepting, pursuant to sections 38 and 39 of the Indian Act, the instrument at Schedule 1 of the Settlement Agreement, which absolutely surrenders to Canada all rights and interests in the Surrendered Lands identified in Schedule B to the Order.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
